citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC's two most recent research animal facility inspections were conducted on April 9, 2024 and April 15, 2025.
This is an interval of twelve months.
Conducting facility inspections less frequently than once every six months could delay the IACUC's detection and
subsequent correction of any departures from Animal Welfare Act.
Correct by ensuring that from this day forward, August 27, 2025, the IACUC inspects all of the research facility's animal
facilities, including animal study areas, at least once every six months.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC's two most recent research animal facility inspections were conducted on April 9, 2024 and April 15, 2025. 
This is an interval of twelve months.  
 
Conducting facility inspections less frequently than once every six months could delay the IACUC's detection and 
subsequent correction of any departures from Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Correct by ensuring that from this day forward, August 27, 2025, the IACUC inspects all of the research facility's animal 
facilities, including animal study areas, at least once every six months. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
